title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 23 December 2015 - XWiki
content:
<vmassol> has quit  
06:20 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
06:54 <cjd> has quit  
06:54 <cjd\_> has joined #xwiki  
07:10 <Ramona1> has joined #xwiki  
08:01 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
08:07 <mflorea> has quit  
08:23 <cjd\_> has quit  
08:35 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:05 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
09:25 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
09:32 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:40 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:44 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:58 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
10:06 <vmassol> good morning everyone  
10:07 <ansuz> bonjour  
10:21 <vmassol> I'm going to try reproducing the postgresql issue this morning  
10:21 <vmassol> would be great if someone could try reproducing https://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12914  
10:28 <vmassol> has quit  
10:29 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
10:32 <Ramona1> has quit  
10:36 <vmassol> has quit  
10:36 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
10:39 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
10:41 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
11:13 <Ramona2> has joined #xwiki  
11:37 <Ramona2> has quit  
11:58 <vmassol> grrrr fyi https://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12940 is real  
11:58 <vmassol> (was able to reproduce)  
12:02 <tmortagne> vmassol: only pgsql ?  
12:04 <vmassol> only tried on it  
12:04 <vmassol> usually the problem also exists on oracle  
12:06 <vmassol> @devs: in case not everyone has noticed, master is now 8.0-SNAPSHOT so if you fix something for 7.4.x you need to merge it on that branch  
12:38 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: don't you think that included pages should be in the right column though? since it's more tech info  
12:38 <vmassol> children, then backlinks then included pages?  
12:38 <vmassol> (from left to right)  
12:38 <gdelhumeau> there is also informations about the translations of that page  
12:39 <vmassol> hmm I didn't see them  
12:39 <vmassol> I think it's better to always display the titles  
12:39 <vmassol> and say "None"  
12:39 <gdelhumeau> that you can see only if the mutli-languages feature is on  
12:39 <vmassol> rather than not display anything  
12:39 <vmassol> for children, backlinks, included pages  
12:39 <vmassol> for translations, indeed it could be acdtive only if the wiki is multilingual  
12:40 <vmassol> having a fixed layout makes it easier IMO for users and for us to lay out  
12:40 <vmassol> anyway this is minor  
12:40 <gdelhumeau> That's what I do for most of them now: https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/8c968d5a7390476ff750166919308295dae90eef#diff-55a893f6aa27495a3e667fbae5d0ea22R33  
12:40 <vmassol> feel free to not do anything for now :) we could improve later on, htis is a small remark  
12:41 <vmassol> ok cool :)  
12:41 <gdelhumeau> for translations, I don't know  
12:51 <Ramona2> has joined #xwiki
